name: Anayeltzy Ruiz
text: Ordered the other night from Postmates. Ordered 2 larger pizzas thinking we were getting a deal but ended up throwing away one whole pizza and half of the other one. The pizzas were completely burnt. And the flavor was just not there. The ‚Ä¶More

text: I came with my friends to Boston after a long drive and we wanted to grab a quick bite to eat. There was nobody on line but I spent over 10 minutes in front of the counter and nobody said anything or acknowledged me, so I left. They also ‚Ä¶More

name: Prajwal Agrawal
text: Its a good place to have a custom made pizza.

name: Viv L
text: The quality has definitely went down. Even the employee make u feel like that they dont want you there. I was on line myself for 5 minutes before finally one employee took break from goofing around to ask what do u want.

name: Veena Bala
text: Excellent pizzas and very quick too! We tried the "build your own" BYO and the dough knots... delicious! A whole pizza is good for one very hungry person or can be shared by two not so hungry people :D

name: Lisa Kurtz
text: I really love their pizzas, they're delicious and fresh, the prices are moderate and the delivery is fast.

name: Nowell Newcomb
text: Great pizza that comes at a great pricepoint,would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for good pizza!

name: kunal shah
text: It‚Äôs like chipotle but for pizza. You start with choosing the base, then sauce and then cheese and the toppings. They will bake it in front of you which is cool. You can add extra sauce on top once it is baked too. Everything is amazing if you choose the right ingredients. 1 star less as the staff is sometimes rude.

name: Nancy Casco
text: exelen food good service

name: Leanne d'Entremont
text: My first time here.  I had " Build your own pizza'" and it was delicious!  Friendly staff,  great food and affordable!  I'll be back.

name: Shruti P
text: My all time favorite! Never been disappointed!

name: Kelly Corrigan
text: Quick, personal pizza(I think 2 or maybe 3 people) would be satisfied.  You can customize or they have some great suggestions. Salads were good too. Fresh,  due to the volume of business. Lots of delivery. Everyone was pleasant. Clean bathrooms and seating. Nice to eat outside too. Not fancy, just a great pizza joint.

name: Stacie A. Banks- Edwards
text: Awesome! My husband and I love this place!

name: Daz Aylward
text: Think Subway with pizzas! Create your own and have it baked in front of you. Good value and courteous staff.

name: G J
text: This place is excellent! Great pizza, friendly staff, quick service. 5 star experience. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sean Ryan
text: Good food, which is what matters.  I didn't like that they were working so fast that they didn't even ask if I wanted my pizza customized. There was a long line, and my pizza was finished cooking well before I was up to the register.  Three stars because I still had a positive experience.

name: tilak balu
text: Loved it. I get my own pizza by customizing in and out

name: Kevin Brown
text:
Good pizza, decent service, acceptable prices.

You can get a personal size pizza made right in front of you for a decent price. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ranga Deshpande
text: Food and ambience are the same, but nothing else lives up to the Blaze brand name. Inattentive staff who dint make pizza customized as requested; bathroom had no soap or paper towels.

name: Scott Craig
text: When I walked in I thought it looked like another typical chain pizza place...with an enthusiastic set of employees. After I ate the pizza I realized the taste was great and the value was really great. I'll be going back.

name: james Sherman
text: The pizza was good, service was fast. When I went they were still learning the pizza was not cooked long enough so the ingredients that were chilled were still cold. I took it back to the counter, they were able to correct the problem ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Martin
text: Maybe I held my expectations too high and that's why I was so disappointed.  The crust is very "frozen pizza" like and the staff not very helpful.  If you need a fast-food pizza, this is the place.  But if you want tasty food, try elsewhere.

name: RW Kwong
text: Fantastic pizza, great prices. They offer larger pizzas online and there is a happy hour special.

name: edythe copeland
text: Pizza was very tasty. Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Quick service .I only eat at blaze near  Cambridge  galleria.

name: Erich Haberman
text: Quick a la carte single serving when you're ambitious. Never disappointed because it's all made right in front of me.

name: The6 Fam
text: Great pizza. Large pizza enough for one

name: Jonathan Rebelo
text: Surprisingly good pizza made on the spot and the pear cucumber water is very refreshing.

name: Lucia De Nile
text: Quick service and tasty pizza. Great for lunch.

name: Jennifer Leason
text: Such great pizza friendly staff

name: Paige Tears-Gladstone

text: Amazing pizza! Loved it, first time there and have a really good experience. My girls loved the pizza too

name: Thu·∫•n Anh V√µ

text: Toppings were decent but not a fan of their crust. YMMV.

name: Jonni Albetta
text: There is a woman that works here at the Cambridge location and I believe her name is Beston? she is so welcoming and makes me feel right at home when I come to eat here! Not to mention the food is sooooo good!

name: Matt S
text: You make your own pizza kind of like Subway but pizza and it was super good.

name: Ariana Hodsdon
text: Quick service, amazing pizza. Fresh and delicious

name: Devon Whitley

name: Ben Marshall

name: Nicolas Fernandez
text: Really good pizza. The customazationn options are plentiful and the prices aren't bad for good pizza. The lines can get long sometimes and cook time can also be long so try to come with time. The staff is friendly and the process is easy. Overall a solid place for pizza.

name: Cindy Edge

name: Gabby R
text:
I love Blaze, but this location is disappointing.

name: Keke P
text: Love this place always great

name: Coco Chanel
text: Lines are too long sometimes but food is made pretty quickly.

name: Benjamin Munyan
text: Went here on a Monday night and the place was chaos. The guy manning the oven had no idea what he was doing, burned pizzas and was putting pizzas on top of each other to cool. Don‚Äôt do drugs, kids. ‚Ä¶More

name: C S
text: Let me start of saying I'm a big fan of blaze pizza.  However, I will not be back to this specific location.  The staff is horrendous in the evenings. The manager yells at their employees around customers and the employees deliver the worst blaze experience around.  My pizza has come out burnt or undercooked everytime I've been.  Beware.

name: Holden Mills
text: Great place! Staff is friendly and accommodating while the food is good and fast. Their soda/drink selection is good too. What more could you want?

name: Avishek Banerjee
text: Blaze is the Mc Donald's of Pizzas, just a 100 times better. The ingredients are crazy fresh and the cook time is over before you start to wait. Every city needs to have a Blaze!!!

text: They gave me the wrong pizza. And on the salad there was a hair. üò§üò°ü§¢

text: This high-rise vegan cheese pizza with spicy red sauce, onions, pepper, & pineapple is everything! The staff changed their gloves & used a different pizza cutter.

text: The staff was super friendly  helping with the menu...I would go back again..

text: Fresh, crispy, tasty. Build the own pizza us great and can be very rich with all selected toppings. Overall great experience.

name: Rosario Knott
text: The pizza was unreal. Its spicy, crunchy, meaty. PERFECT! I find myself trying to find reasons to go that far from where I live, just so we can go back.

name: Alex Timofeev
text: Great place for a quick lunch. Very friendly and helpful staff and delicious pizza

name: Patrick Helmes
text: Blaze has factored heavily into my lunch rotation ever since they started offering the keto dough. At 6 net grams of carbs, it is much easier to justify pizza for lunch as healthy eating. Service is always fast so its a great spot to grab a bite when you're on the go.

name: winejew

name: Tony Ramos
text: Vegan pizza option? Uh yeah! Delicious. Definitely going back.

name: Aayushi Panchal
text:
Unlimited toppings. Wood fired pizza
Cheap price. Great taste

name: stanley chung
text: Food is always good, but the wait is atrocious here, even without others in line. This location never seems to be ready, between the dough or toppings. By far the slowest Blaze in the Boston area.

name: Tim Hamilton
text:
I eat here way more than I should. I've tried a lot of different things on their menu. All of it is decent, I haven't ever ordered something that I regretted.Pizza is definitely their strongest dish.
Repeat customer here. Good management and service.

name: Fariha O
text: Pizza and service was great!

text: Great pizza place. Massive overflowing toppings while still maintaining the integral crispness of a thin pizza.

name: Frinkasaurus

name: Spero Dimas

name: Evette Haddad

name: akanksha k
text: Blaze is one of the chains in which location really matters. Blaze on Comm Ave is awesome. But the one closer to Assembly Row was not that good.

name: Michael Kuhner
text: The food was great, but to be denied your "lunch hack" deal because I was not a college student was really ignorant. You should not have to argue with someone to get an affordable lunch when your company litteraly says ". . .to further support Brand's goal of making Artisanal pizza Accessible To ALL. "

name: Ingrid DeLeon Jerez
text: Love their pizza. Unlike any other pizzeria.

name: Griffin Stotland
text: A bit slow but good food

name: David Matsuyama

name: brandon waring
text: April 21st evening visit - most of the staff were awful, rude and made me uncomfortable. Blaze is one of the only fast-food options that don't make me sick so I frequent other locations. But I will never return to this one. ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith M
text: The pizza here is of amazing quality and the prices are great! Also the service here is on point, they move at a pretty good pace despite how busy they constantly seem to be. I definitely recommend it if you're in the mood for some pizza.

name: Brenton Palmer
text: Visited Cambridge last week and found a gem in Blaze Pizza. Combos were off the hook. Pies delish.

name: John Johanson
text: A very satisfying pie, and a cool process. Amazing the oven turns out perfectly fired pizza seemingly microwave-fast!

name: Tanveer Deora
text: Great service always.

name: Patricia Elizabeth Wright
text: Omg! This place is great, the pizzas are made to order! Fabulous am hooked!!! By the way the service is great to!!!!

name: Akash Srivastava
text: This place offers Keto üçï. It's made with a mix of cauliflower and other low carb flour alternatives averaging at roughly 3g of net carbs. Taste wide though the base isn't great, I still prefer the taste of cauliflower crust which is also available here. I think it has slightly higher net carbs.

name: Charlie Byrd
text: Mt second visit to a Blaze restaurant. The pizza was great and fast! Rose and Tim were awesome. I watched them work and they practice clean and safe procedures which explains why the restaurant was so clean. Keep up the amazing work!

name: Glenn Hughes
text: Great pizza, custom made, friendly staff

name: Danielle Santos
text: THEY CLOSED AT 8:25PM WHEN THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO TECHNICALLY CLOSE AT 9PM. THIS IS EXTREMELY INCONVENIENT FOR PEOPLE WHO LEAVE WORK LATE AND IS TRYING TO FIND A MEAL TO EAT. The machines should not be turned off more than half an hour before ACTUALLY closing!

name: Robert Barnes
text: I'm a real Blaze devotee, but my last couple trips had been a slight letdown. Not wild about the menu changes, and the staff (while doing their best) are simply outnumbered at the busier times.

name: Erik Antelman
text: Good pizza and it really is fast. Thin crispy crust, all the toppings you could want, price reasonable and staff friendly. I would recommend.

name: Bob Araujo
text: Great pizza!  Thin crust made to your preference.  Delicious.  Highly recommended.

name: Claudiatouille G
text: This pizza came in clutch for me when I was hungry as ever...and it was worth it! the bottom of the crust is not to hard but not too soft and I love to see it getting made in front of my eyes as well as the pizza being fired in front of me. THIS PLACE MAKES ME HAPPY. ON DEAD DAWGS. PERIOD EPI DATS IT.

text: It was ightt. Pizza was a tiny bit burnt but it was still gucci. I used to work at one so i get it, you know?

name: Aime Syed
text: Sorry about the earlier 1star, thought this was the place below Brooklyn bridge. Sorry, this pizza my boys loved. Totally self made, in front of you & run by a strong girl team. All with a smile and super friendly üôåüëå

text: Yummy

name: Chuck Binda
text: Pretty quick and friendly service. Got the simple pie , which is just a cheese pizza, because it's always a good way to tell if I should go back. I thought it was good but a thin crust should be more crispy. I would still go back. Reasonably priced.

text: Love their thin crust and unlimited toppings for less than 10. Gets crowded during lunch time, better to order online/app to avoid the wait.

text: Outstanding flavor and ingredients‚Äînot a bad pizza in the shop! Drinks are unique and flavorful. Great prices and food up fast. Great for kids!

name: Wayne Wilson
text: Great Pizza, as always! Love the restaurant design and atmosphere. Kudos to the employees for keeping up with the traffic and delivering another homerun experience!

name: Kevin Glynn
text: If you've never been to a Blaze Pizza, you should fix that right away. It's like Subway meets Pizza, but way better. Gluten free and vegan pizza? Yup. Great prices? Yup. Great quality? Absolutely.

text: Was ok. Had a little too much sauce on it and the bottom of the crust was a little blackened for my taste. Didn't like as much as Pizzafire or 1000 Degrees.

name: Dr. Cassandra Bragg-Collins
text: The quick concept is nice. The employees were patient. The cook however, he cooked the food too much. If a customer says that their pizza is cooked enough for them, then the cook should take the pizza from the oven. The cook we had that day ‚Ä¶More

name: chris_cartaya
text: I love the assembly line approach and seeing it through every Step of the process. Pick what you want, watch it cook, take to stay or to go. Been there twice, staff very friendly. Size is just right, price is just right. Will continue to go back. Wish they had one in east Boston!

name: Phil Shannon
text: Great quick pizza's for lunch. Although the line does get long after noon, it goes quickly. Nice fresh ingredients, friendly staff.

name: Andy Mei
text: Meh pizza, compared to something like Domino's they're better, though

text: Tim, who works the night shift, is a superstar. I walked in one minute before the store was supposed to close, and he wasn't impatient in the slightest.

text: They take forever for service and have to wait just to pay. I would not recommend this place for a quick bite. The manger has no system. Honestly one of the worst places I‚Äôve ever been.

name: Jessie J
text: Delicious pizza for a very reasonable price!! My family and I were in town for a basketball camp and stumbled across your location. The service was top notch!!

text: Good homemade pizzas. You can pick from a variety of toppings and it was not too expensive. Under 10$ which is generally pretty good for kendall square area. Would recommend.

text: Made before your eyes. Chose a specialty pizza and add more to it for same price (great deal ). Definitely  add salt. Only problem i had was it desperately  needed salt. They make the pizza  in 5 min or so saucy  and delicious

name: Shane Bogue
text: Best pizza I ever had

text: First time at a Blaze and I'm very satisfied! Me and my girlfriend thoroughly enjoyed our pizzas and were impressed at the speed they were cooked while still retaining good quality. Will be coming back.
